titleStmt.title: A potion for an apothecary, or, The apothecaryes portion, this ditty doth concern a matter rare ... To the tune of, Old flesh.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half-sheet contains: The words that were written in the counterfeit letter, as if they came from her brother out of the country.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
